problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following are forms of unused energy at the Dartmouth Powerplant? Check the TWO that apply.<< [] heat to buildings [x] noise [] nuclear waste [] electricity [x] waste heat
[explanation] Noise and waste heat are unused outputs from the powerplant. Nuclear waste is the byproduct of the fuel for a nuclear reactor powerplant. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the following are forms of unused energy at the Dartmouth Powerplant? Check the TWO that apply.

checkboxgroup.label: Which of the following are forms of unused energy at the Dartmouth Powerplant? Check the TWO that apply.

div.p: Noise and waste heat are unused outputs from the powerplant. Nuclear waste is the byproduct of the fuel for a nuclear reactor powerplant.
